response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is a fair and advantageous proposition given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers. We hope to facilitate a transaction that is mutually beneficial and looks forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
